  • Constructor Details

    • PlateauNim

      public PlateauNim(int heapNumber, int maxMatches)
      makes the actual plateau stores the maximum number of matches that can be removed
      Parameters:
      heapNumber - number of heaps to create nombre de tas à créer
      maxMatches - maximum number of matches that can be removed nombre maximum d'allumettes qui peuvent être retirées

  • Method Details

    • jouerCoup

      public void jouerCoup(int[] target) throws HeapNumberException, MatchesNumberException, CoupException, NotEnoughMatchesException
      plays each turn of the game
      Specified by:
      jouerCoup in class AbstractPlateau
      Parameters:
      target - {Heap;number of matches} which heap to subtract the matches from {Tas;nombre d'allumettes} quel tas soustraire les allumettes {1;2} remove 2 matches from heap 1
      Throws:
      HeapNumberException - if the heap number is invalid
      MatchesNumberException - if the number of matches to remove is bigger than the maximum allowed
      CoupException - if the number of matches to remove is invalid or the heap is empty
      NotEnoughMatchesException - if there are not enough matches in the heap
